definition: worthy of being chosen especially as a spouse, an important, honorable person (word is often used humorously)
details:
adjective
- worthy of being chosen especially as a spouse
= synonyms: desirable
- having qualities or abilities that merit recognition in some way
= example: having qualities or abilities that merit recognition in some way
- having worth or merit or value
= synonyms: worthful
noun
- an important, honorable person (word is often used humorously)
